text: Marcel Elphege "Little Beaver" Dionne (born August 3, 1951) is a retired Canadian professional ice hockey centre. He played 18 seasons in the National Hockey League for the Detroit Red Wings, Los Angeles Kings and New York Rangers. Dionne entered the Hockey Hall of Fame in 1992.Career profile on legends of hockey.net ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Art Ross Trophy winners Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Lady Byng Memorial Trophy winners Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Kings players Category:New York Rangers players Category:International Hockey League (1945â€“2001) players Category:Quebec Major Junior Hockey League players
title: Marcel Dionne
